pullrequest.title: Implemented AddLinkForce for ODE with integration tests

content.raw:
I made a bunch of updates in [branch add_XXX_force_scpeters](#!/osrf/gazebo/branches/compare/add_XXX_force_scpeters..add_XXX_force#diff):

* Add `Matrix3::Inverse`
* Add `Link::GetWorldAngularMomentum`
* Fix `Link::Get*AngularAccel` functions
* add comments to test
* patch ODE bug (supplied by @hsu)

The new functions will require tests.
content.html:
I made a bunch of updates in branch add_XXX_force_scpeters:

  • Add Matrix3::Inverse
  • Add Link::GetWorldAngularMomentum
  • Fix Link::Get*AngularAccel functions
  • add comments to test
  • patch ODE bug (supplied by @hsu)

The new functions will require tests.
